title: Just a quick question about matchmaking
body: If I que up for a game with someone who is a much level lower than me, who will it pair us up against? I don't wanna put them at a huge disadvantage or anything but I also wanna play with this person.

replies.body: Matchmaking will do its best to queue up players of similar skills together, and average out the teams.  If your friend is level 20 then you might have another similar player on the other team, but it's not guaranteed because a lot of it depends on who is queuing up at that moment.  Our [matchmaking guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752954-Matchmaking-Guide) might offer more visibility as well!
